ai-thi-ap2:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,

ai-thi-ap2:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-thi-ap2:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-thi-ap2:3.4_0: this is the defeat of the Shrine.

ai-thi-ap2:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Palettiya.
